title: We have been in Wilmington for two years and like the monuments, statues and fountains in the middle of Market and other other downtown street.  Can you tell me about them: when were they erected, who do they recognize and who maintains them?  Thanks
text:
Most
of the monuments, memorials and markers you've asked about have been
the subject of previous MyReporter.com answers. If you search
MyReporter.com for those terms, you will find links to several related
answers.
